original_text: Joab's soldiers were all around Rabbah city and they were watching it carefully. Joab sent Uriah to fight near to the city, where the enemy's best soldiers were.
korean_text: 요압이 그 성을 살펴 용사들이 있는 것을 아는 그 곳에 우리아를 두니

sentences.original_text: Joab's soldiers were all around Rabbah city
and they were watching it carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것을 주의 깊게 지켜보고 있었다

sentences.original_text: Joab sent Uriah to fight near to the city
sentences.korean_translation: 요압은 우리아를 성 가까이에서 싸우도록 보냈는데

sentences.original_text: where the enemy's best soldiers were
